com.sql.ddl.DataBaseAndSchemaQuestions

Class HowToCreateDataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sql.ddl.DataBaseAndSchemaQuestions.HowToCreateDataBase

  • public class HowToCreateDataBase
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is about how to 1. create database with regular statement, if exist statement, if not exist statement 2. rename data base with store procedure 3. drop data base with is exist statement.
    Author:
    Faruq
